markdown:
**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 126, [PFS Scenario #1-17: The Perennial Crown Part 2, The Thorned Monarch](/Sources.aspx?ID=34) pg. 30 _[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters who have gained access to the Fey Influence feat from a Pathfinder Society scenario gain access to the expanded version of this feat printed in Lost Omens: Impossible Lands. This does not grant access to any additional feats._ --- You have been exposed to powerful fey magic. You become trained in primal DCs and spell attack rolls. You gain the [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69) trait and one of the following features that grants an innate primal spell that can be used once per day.
  • **Anteater** You can launch your tongue forward as a deadly attack, gaining [_grim tendrils_](/Spells.aspx?ID=141).
  • **[Cat Sith](/Monsters.aspx?ID=517)** You have catlike features and can appear as a mundane cat with [_pest form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=217) (cat only).
  • **Cursed Bluebird** You have blue feathers or wings. It's terrible luck to harm a bluebird, and you can manifest that power as [_ill omen_](/Spells.aspx?ID=696).
  • **[Dryad](/Monsters.aspx?ID=312)** Your body is covered in elegant vines, granting you [_summon plant or fungus_](/Spells.aspx?ID=325).
  • **Faun** Your legs and feet are swift and possibly hooved, granting you [_fleet step_](/Spells.aspx?ID=122).
  • **[Gremlin](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=58)** You have long, bat-like ears and gain [_bane_](/Spells.aspx?ID=18).
  • **Monarch** You have vestigial, insectile features and gain [_spider sting_](/Spells.aspx?ID=300).
  • **[Unicorn](/Monsters.aspx?ID=397)** You have a magical horn or a prominent symbol of one on your forehead, which you can use to cast [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148).
**Special** This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry ([human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90) for [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6), [goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81) for [goblin](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=4), etc.). Fey Influence leads to... [Cannibalize Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=4049), [Drain Emotion](/Feats.aspx?ID=4047), [Eldritch Calm](/Feats.aspx?ID=4051), [Fey Ascension](/Feats.aspx?ID=4048), [Fey Transcendence](/Feats.aspx?ID=4052), [Glamour](/Feats.aspx?ID=4050)
name: Fey Influence

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="All Ancestries" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=467" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 126</row>

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Your exposure to fey influence has given you some primal magic
</summary>
summary: Your exposure to fey influence has given you some primal magic
